scripts.start: cd server && npm i && node server.js && cd ../client && npm i && npm run build && cd ../server && rm -rf public && rm -rf build && cd ../client && mv build ../server && cd ../server && mv build public
scripts.start-window: cd ./client && npm i && npm run build && cd ../server && del public && del build && cd ../client && move build ../server && cd ../server && ren build public && node server.js
scripts.build-window: cd ./client && cd ../server && del public && del build && cd ../client && move build ../server && cd ../server && ren build public
